articles.author: Naman Ramachandran
articles.title: ZEE5 Global Expands U.S. Presence, Aggregating Add-On South Asian Streaming Platforms - Variety
articles.description: Streamer ZEE5 Global is aggregating six South Asian streaming services within its platform in the U.S.
articles.content:
Streamer ZEE5 Global is taking a leaf out of the Prime Video Channels playbook by aggregating six South Asian streaming services within its platform in the U.S. 
Branded as Add-ons, the streamers ar… [+4716 chars]
